svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2024-02-27T09:36:28.363Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/121.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 OPR/107.0.0.0 (Edition Yx 05)" etag="2gEwI6Na6mZSVEBcQxOU" version="23.1.7" type="github"> <diagram name="Страница — 1" id="Y4tsIzCWBfQKCb4jmjgA"> <mxGraphModel dx="996" dy="559" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-3" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-1" target="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-1" value="начало" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="364" y="20" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-5" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-2" target="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-4"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-2" value="<div>FILE* F;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; abt user;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; int f;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; f = fopen_s(&amp;F,"file.bin", "wb, ccs=UNICODE");</div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="354" y="160" width="120" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-7" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-4" target="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-6"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-17" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-4" target="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-16"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-4" value="&nbsp; if (f != NULL)&nbsp;" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="374" y="330" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-9" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-6" target="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-8"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-6" value="<div>cout &lt;&lt; "Файл открыт" &lt;&lt; endl;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; cout &lt;&lt; "Введите ФИО,&nbsp; год рождения, оценки за экзамены, средний балл за аттестат: " &lt;&lt; endl;</div>" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="430" width="240" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-13" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-8" target="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-12"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-8" value="<div>abt user = input_abt();</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; write(user);</div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="610" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-15" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-12" target="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-14"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-12" value="cout &lt;&lt; "Вы ввели: " &lt;&lt; endl;" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="700" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-19" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-14" target="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-18"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-14" value="read(user);" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="790" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-20" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-16"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="330" y="911.60009765625" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="592" y="912" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-16" value="&nbsp;cout &lt;&lt; "Не удалось открыть файл" &lt;&lt; endl;" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="514" y="430" width="156" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-18" value="fclose(F);" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="270" y="970" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-21" value="конец" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="1080" width="100" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-22" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-18" target="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-21"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-23" value="<div>&nbsp;return 0;</div><div>}</div>" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.annotation_2;align=left;labelPosition=right;pointerEvents=1;dashed=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="330" y="1040" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-24" value="<div>#include &lt;iostream&gt;</div><div>#include &lt;string&gt;</div><div>#include &lt;stdio.h&gt;</div><div>#include &lt; cstdio &gt;</div><div>using namespace std;</div><div><div>int main()</div><div>{</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; setlocale(LC_ALL, "Russian");</div></div>" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.annotation_2;align=left;labelPosition=right;pointerEvents=1;dashed=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="414" y="70" width="156" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-25" value="True" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="220" y="340" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="E1Meos-VmnKaXw80uQcH-26" value="False" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="530" y="340" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
